友達とやる分には楽しい。
ドトンネル、ドキャンプという類のものが非常につまらなくなるのに未だに直していない。
新キャラを出してごまかしているだけ。新キャラもただの貞子の上位互換では？って感じで二番煎じだったり。
それ以外は勝っても負けても楽しい。負けてもハグ出来る。
最後の仕方のないドキャンプなどは良いが第一村人になりやられるまでが早くなる。正直眺めてるだけ。つまり時間の無駄が始まる。やられてからも少しやれることがあればまだいいのにとも思う。邪魔までは出来なくてもいい。ポイント稼ぎ程度の何かを。
友達と以外はしませんが、自身から新しく誘おうとは思えないです。カスタムだけなら楽しめるかなとは思うけれど。
its good

I do not like this game at all. I thought this would be like white noise 2. And granted it has the same the same concept as the white noise series, This game is just wildly unbalanced. The survivors have ever advantage they need to outrun the killers from flashbang builds to just abusing the vault mechanics. The tier system for match making is just a busted concept all around since there isn't a single player mode to play with and become familiar with maps and skills you end up trying to play a level 1 survivor or killer that you've never played against whatever your tier is for the matching. If I would have known ahead of time that this game didn't have a single player option, I wouldn't have bought it at all. If I would have had the foresight to look up character builds on youtube and seen all the trolling survivors do with abusing the vaulting system, flash lights and flash bangs, I definitely wouldn't have bought this game. Match making ques don't seem to take long which is nice, if the game doesn't freeze up and crash during the match.
Love the game, hate the players. But yea it's good when you're not in solo queue.

Dead by Daylight is a fantastic multiplayer experience. While it can be a bit annoying dealing with some Perks and Killers - looking at YOU, Hag, Nurse and Doctor - every match feels fun and frantic as well as different thanks to the changes in Prop placement each match and the Add-Ons and Blessings available for use.

6周年おめでとうレビュー！
やっていない期間がありつつも配信当初からプレイしています。鯖7鬼3ぐらいの割合。
「DBDは1000時間まではチュートリアル」という言葉の通り、その’’覚悟’’がある’’選ばれし者’’のみが続けられるゲームである。
パークやらマップやら増えすぎて初心者バイバイ感あり。覚えるのも大変、教える方も大変なのでオススメはしませんが、セール時には1000円切るので、その時に購入してやってみるのもありかと思います。
ですが、2022年8月頃に大幅にシステムが変更しパーク等取りやすくなるみたいなので、セール時に購入し8月まで温めておいてもいいかもしれません。
自分的には、「VCを繋ぎ友達とワイワイやるゲーム」という感覚ではなく、「ひたすらソロプレイして熟練度(プレイヤースキル)を高めていくゲーム」だと思っています。
まぁ友達がいないから誰ともできないだけなんですけどね！！！！！！
鯖はトンネルキャンプイライラゲーミング。鬼は屈伸ライトカチカチイライラゲーミング。ドM向きゲームです。1000時間以上もやっていると悟りを開きなんの感情も湧かなくなってくるのでそういう意味での「1000時間まではチュートリアル」という言葉なのかもしれませんね。。。

After hearing that Dead by Daylight had tags like "survival", "horror", "online", the first template that came to my mind was actually "DayZ" and "H1Z1".  But "Dead by Daylight" is not the same as them. Although there are similarities in style, this game can be said to be very different from the first two in terms of design concept.  Since the whole game takes place on various farms, and the survivors need to develop motors and the butchers need to catch them, the game is also nicknamed "The Farmer and the Electric Thief's Story".

Like cat and mouse in real life, the number of survivors and butchers in Dead by Daylight is also unequal.  We have seen similar 1vN designs in the previous "Evolve", but unfortunately the balance of "Evolve" is not well done, which is also one of the important reasons for its poor sales.  And "Dead by Daylight" has used a lot of brains in this regard, and the final result presented to the player can be said to be quite good.

One of the commendable things about Dead by Daylight is that it knows how to make the players involved in the game fight their wits, try to figure out the minds of opponents and teammates, and use strategies to achieve their goals.  In other words, the game "Dead by Daylight" requires you to constantly figure out other people's minds and make your own choices, which is the most interesting part of it.  Unlike games like "H1Z1", the voice system is intentionally not added to the game, all you can do is guess in the scary background music: Will the butcher leave?  Will teammates be fooled?  Should I go and save this person?  Who will save me?

Dead by Daylight also has many other advantages, such as the horror sound effects that many players praise.  Whether it's the crescendo of the butcher's heartbeat as the butcher approaches, the manic drumbeat of the butcher chasing the survivors, the chimes that appear every time the invisible butcher uses his abilities, or the screeching of the chainsaw before the chainsaw butcher sprints...

Dead by Daylight is a creative and well-designed online horror survival game.  If you're tired of fighting with those stupid AIs, give this game a try. The characters you encounter are controlled by living humans.  You know, fighting with real people is the most fun.
